title: Dil Phoolon Ki Basti
description: Dil Phoolon Ki Basti is a very popular novel By famous woman novelist Nighat Abdullah. She has produced many master pieces best sellers including Dil PhooloN ki basti (Novel), MohabbatoN ke Dermayan (collection of novelettes) and Mohabbat ka hassar. Novel Dil Phoolon ki Basti is just one of them. The novel is all about human nature and behaviours, emotions, desires, thinkings and strong family bonds.
author: Nighat Abdullah
